ComicInfo.Title: Perry Masonry; Observation Test; Flashes from Outer Space; Baseball Statisticiatic; Cracked Simple Test to Determine Whether You Are a Torch-Bearer; How to Meet Your Next Door Neighbor; Cracked Brings You Greetings; Casual Format; Enlistment Posters; Tipping; Cracked Sportslants; Be a Movie Director; It All Depends Upon the Point of View; Ancient Psychiatry; Charge It; Whatever Happened to These Movie Scenes?; The Home Life of a T.V. Moderator; Fraternity Keys
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.What the television programs Ed Sullivan, Perry Como, I Love Lucy, Gunsmoke and Racket Squad would be like if they were paced more casually.
A look at the problems with tipping people.
People have differing reactions to a cobra, monkeys, trees, the Grand Canyon, bullying children and an atomic bomb.
In earlier days a psychiatrist has Oedipus, Hamlet and Quasimodo as his patients.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:45:18. [Issue ID 250371]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,Basil Wolverton,Bill Ward,Bill Everett,Gray Morrow,Bill Elder
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Basil Wolverton,Bill Ward,Bill Everett,Gray Morrow,Bill Elder
